verses.plain: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.

tokens.t: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.

verses.plain: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.

tokens.t: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.

verses.plain: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.

tokens.t: Great
the
, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness
unsearchable.

verses.plain: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.

tokens.t: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.

verses.plain: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.

tokens.t: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.

verses.plain: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.

tokens.t: And
shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.

verses.plain: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.

tokens.t: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.

verses.plain: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.

tokens.t: The
gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.

verses.plain: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

tokens.t: The
good to all: and his tender mercies
over all his works.

verses.plain: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.

tokens.t: All thy works shall praise thee, O
; and thy saints shall bless thee.

verses.plain: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;

tokens.t: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;

verses.plain: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.

tokens.t: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.

verses.plain: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.

tokens.t: Thy kingdom
an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion
throughout all generations.

verses.plain: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.

tokens.t: The
upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all
bowed down.

verses.plain: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.

tokens.t: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.

verses.plain: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.

tokens.t: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.

verses.plain: The LORD is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.

tokens.t: The
righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.

verses.plain: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.

tokens.t: The
nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.

verses.plain: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.

tokens.t: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.

verses.plain: The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.

tokens.t: The
preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.

verses.plain: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.

tokens.t: My mouth shall speak the praise of the
: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.

footnotes.text: and his…: Heb. and of his greatness there is no search
of great…: Heb. great in mercy
an…: Heb. a kingdom of all ages
